ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 257
ygData.msgSnippet: Bah, cast it, whack on your buddies to wake them up, then contiune the fight.  Or, cast it, debuff and entrall/entrance the MOBs, then wake up your party =P
ygData.messageBody:
Bah, cast it, whack on your buddies to wake them up, then contiune the
fight. Or, cast it, debuff and entrall/entrance the MOBs, then wake up
your party =P That was you don't have to tell them to stop breaking your
messes!!!
<grins evily>


Previous Post:\
> From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
>
> Mesmerization is a great spell for lower levels, at higher levels IMO it
is
> much better to use entrance. On a usual pull of 1-4 mobs you can
entrance,


I must admit I'm jealous... mesmerization is completely useless on rallos
zek.

Cogg
